entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a kind and experienced person who works at Hogwarts. He has a wild beard and eyebrows but wears a very kind smile.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who is famous but doesn't know what he's famous for. He's being sent to Hogwarts by Hagrid.

entities.name: vol
entities.description: Vol is likely a nickname or name of Harry's father, as mentioned in the text.

entities.name: harry's parents
entities.description: Harry's parents are mentioned as having died. Their names are not specified.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school that Harry will be attending, according to Hagrid.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's relatives who have been taking care of him. They are mentioned as being problematic for Harry.

entities.name: king's cross
entities.description: King's Cross is a location where the Hogwarts train departs from.

relationships.description: Hagrid works at Hogwarts, as mentioned in the text.
Hagrid is mentoring Harry and helping him get to Hogwarts.
Harry will be attending Hogwarts as a student, according to Hagrid.
